ps1

Class RatTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • ps1.RatTerm

  • public class RatTerm
extends java.lang.Object
    RatTerm is an immutable record type representing a term in a polynomial expression. The term has the form coeff * x^expt.

    A RatTerm t can be notated by the pair (C . E), where C is the string representation of t.coeff, and E is t.expt.

    For a given RatTerm r, "coefficient of r" is synonymous with r.coeff, and likewise "exponent of r" is synonymous with r.expt.

    (1 . 3), (3/4 . 17), (7/2 . -1), and (NaN . 74) are all valid RatTerms, corresponding to the polynomial terms "x^3", "3/4*x^17", "7/2*x^-1" and "NaN*x^74", respectively.

        Return the additive inverse of this RatTerm.
